title: Forecast Rice Export Value to Bangladesh Using Historical Trends
problem_statement: Predict quarterly rice export values (INR) to Bangladesh using historical 2018-2021 data with verified ≥65% completeness. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness for 2018-2021 period.

join_plan.notes: Single dataset analysis using HS Code/Description composite key

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Drop 2023-24 records due to 62.5% nulls, impute small gaps using forward fill

validation_plan: Time series split: Train on 2018-2021 (complete data), validate on 2022-23, test on 2024-25
quality_checks: Verify ≥65% non-null in all feature columns
Check for monotonic value trends across years
